website_summaries.verdict: A great bargain for those who don't mind calling their own numbers without the help of a cage, balls, or calling cards.
pros: An affordable bargain with 100 cards and 1,000 chips
Great for the classroom and other large gatherings
cons: Occasional complaints of duplicate cards in the set

customer_reviews.title: Cards are poorly produced
customer_reviews.text: I run bingo games for my business and there were several cards with repeating numbers. For instance, there would be 2- B9s on the same card. Very problematic for the reputation of my business. A few people have complained.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cards are super flimsy but you get what you pay for. It does come with a whole lot of cards though too. #’s on the board go up to 75
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Used these a couple times for family gatherings...large family...worked great. Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Cards are a little more flimsy than I would prefer. Otherwise great product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Bingo Bungle
customer_reviews.text: Four of the cards had duplicate numbers in the same column. Otherwise was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LJB

customer_reviews.title: BINGO with no “calling cards” 🤨
customer_reviews.text: This bingo set came without “calling cards”. I guess I will be returning them. How do you play BINGO without a way to call numbers or remember what numbers had been called.
customer_reviews.author: L. Worthen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter’s BINGO game at her birthday party. Pretty durable...
customer_reviews.author: abracadabra

customer_reviews.title: Good product, they may want to examine bags before shipping
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product. It is the right size, sheerness and has a lot in it for the price for both cards and chips. I knocked it down a star because I almost scratched my thumb on this sharp piece of plastic that was in the bag with the chips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon mom

customer_reviews.title: What I got was good and will last
customer_reviews.text: Cards are sturdy and plastic pieces are quality - the only missing - the call numbers, had to use from another set.
customer_reviews.author: Black Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These cards and chips are perfect to use time and time again! We used to play Blingo with my direct sales jewelry company and they were perfect! We'll use them again and again. More than enough chips that if we got extra sets of cards we likely would not need more chips!
customer_reviews.author: Lipstickchica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! This is great bundle with a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is fun for all age groups.
customer_reviews.text: My family loved playing bingo. We played after our thanksgiving feast.
customer_reviews.author: Robert satcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, bought it for a bingo at my church and was great, rehusable, good material, great size of the bingo chips. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA PAULA ESCOBAR

customer_reviews.title: No bingo chips included
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I sent this as a gift and there were no bingo chips included with the cards. Contacted the seller and have heard nothing.
customer_reviews.author: psikonski

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The price of the item was great and the actual product was fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product does not contain a calling sheet for bingo.
customer_reviews.text: Product does not contain a calling sheet for the game therefore it's difficult to use for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for Large Events
customer_reviews.text: I loved how big the chips was. And the quantity of of chips/cards, my family enjoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Bingo cards and markers
customer_reviews.text: This bingo cards are of a good quality. The bingo markers are very colorful.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: The bingo cards are durable, good quality. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jami F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great . Had a bingo night and came with everything !
customer_reviews.author: David Perla

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got the bingo set for school. I teach my grand children . We use alot of games in our learning . They love it
customer_reviews.author: B. Driver

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bingo cards
customer_reviews.text: The bingo cards are nice but I was looking for cardboard. The ones we have now are older but made out of thick cardboard. That is why they lasted for years. I was going to return them but I decided to laminate them. We all like everything that comes with it and they are very easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi K

product_meta.title: Yuanhe Bingo Game Set with 100 Bingo Cards and 1000 Colorful Transparent Bingo Chips
product_meta.description:
Tired of Bingo Cards that get used up and thrown away? 
These reusable cards will let you play without filling up the landfills.
You will receive 100 cards in each of the following colors: red, yellow, purple, blue and green.
Featuring a unique numbering system, each card measures 4.7 inches wide and 5.2 inches tall. 
1000 Pieces 3/4 inch Colorful Transparent Bingo Chips.
Colorful transparent bingo chips make your bingo number easy to mark and read.It can be used for a long time.
Finger-tip cards are perfect for fundraisers, parties, corporate events, bus trips, and family reunions.
feature_bullets: Set of 100 mixed color bingo cards and 1000 Pieces 3/4 inch Colorful Transparent Bingo Chips.
Cards measure 4.7" wide and 5.2" tall, printed bold numbers, easy to read.
3/4 inch colorful transparent bingo chips make your bingo number easy to mark and read.
High quality can be used for a long time.
Ideal for party, classroom, charity house or everywhere that need to learn counting, sort, group, ect

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
